sect1.title: Charsets
sect1.para: You might experience problems with special characters when communicating with old DOS clients. Codepage support has changed in samba 3.0. Read the chapter Unicode support for details.

sect1.title: Obsolete configuration options
sect1.para: In 3.0, the following configuration options have been removed.

simplelist.member: printer driver (replaced by new driver procedures)
printer driver file (replaced by new driver procedures)
printer driver location (replaced by new driver procedures)
client code page (replaced by dos charset)
